import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { useState } from 'react'; class Footer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { name : null, email : null, comments : null }; } nameChangeHandler = (event) => { console.log(event.target.value); } submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log(this.state); const name = event.target.name.value; const email = event.target.email.value; const comments = event.target.comments.value; this.setState({name, email, comments}, () => { console.log(this.state); event.target.name.value = ""; event.target.email.value = ""; event.target.comments.value = ""; }); } render() { return (
